bibl.title: Note sul lessico della rhesis di Panfile (Men. Epitr. 801-835).
Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.

bibl.note: Contributo allo studio del lessico di Men. Epitr. 801-835 sulla base di P. Mich. Inv. 4752 a-c + 4805 (= M.-P.3 1301.011; LDAB 2643).
bibl.seg: Angelo Casanova, Note sul lessico della rhesis di Panfile (Men. Epitr. 801-835).

Tomasz Derda, Adam Łajtar & Jakub Urbanik (edd.), in cooperation with Andrzej Mirończuk & Tomasz Ochała, Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology, Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013. Volume I. Literary Papyri: Texts and Studies = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXVIII (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 129-143.
Contributo allo studio del lessico di Men. Epitr. 801-835 sulla base di P. Mich. Inv. 4752 a-c + 4805 (= M.-P.3 1301.011; LDAB 2643).
